episodes.title: Divine Parent Archetypes, Men's Circles & Gender Work | The Uncomfortable Truth| ISTA Day #4
episodes.description:
Continuing this ISTA training documentation as we dive into day 4, where things get complicated with divine parent archetypes, gender exploration, and my brutally honest take on men's circles. For those researching what happens at ISTA workshops - today challenged my preconceptions about how these trainings approach gender and sexuality.

The day moved through several temple arts exercises: working with mother/father archetypes (which gets awkward when you're attracted to your scene partners), exploring divine sisterhood (yes, as a man), and a men's circle that actually surprised me. If you're wondering about ISTA boundaries work, today pushed some interesting edges around gender roles and conditioning.

This ISTA Level 1 experience continues to mirror some Tantra workshops I've done before, but with its own specific approach. For those researching tantra workshop experiences - while there's overlap, ISTA has distinct differences in how they handle these topics.

One thing that stands out in this training: The contrast between societal conditioning ("go to school, get a job, die") and exploring new ways of relating. This isn't your typical personal development workshop - it's raw, sometimes uncomfortable, and definitely not for everyone.

Watch Days 1-3 first for context on this ISTA journey. As always, this is just my direct experience - neither marketing nor warning, just what actually happened.

#ISTA #TantraWorkshop #ConsciousnessWork #personaldevelopment 

00:00 Intro & cult reflections - "Hope I haven't joined another cult"
01:13 Morning meditation and manifesting breakfast with blueberries
02:45 Wheel of Consent dating exercise & exploring non-monogamy
04:30 Breaking down societal conditioning ("go to school, get a job, die")
05:58 Divine Parent archetypes intro - Mother/Father exercises
07:20 Creating familial relationships (awkward with attraction)
08:45 Divine Sisterhood exploration begins
09:30 Women's experiences & perspectives - powerful sharing
11:15 Emotional response to women's stories
12:40 Men's circle critique begins
13:55 Actual men's circle experience vs expectations
15:20 BDSM conversation & boundaries
16:45 Final reflections on intensity & group dynamics

episodes.title: Shadows, Self-Discovery, and the Power of No! – ISTA #3
episodes.description:
Continuing my ISTA training review and documentation of what actually happens at these workshops. Day 3 dives into shadow work, the Wheel of Consent practice, and ends with a self-pleasure temple night. For those researching ISTA Level 1 experiences or wondering about tantra workshop boundaries - this one gets personal.

Starting with early morning OSHO No-Dimension meditation (which involves some Sufi-style spinning), we moved through shadow exploration exercises and into the Wheel of Consent - a framework for understanding giving and receiving touch. The day culminated in a temple arts ritual that I'm choosing to keep private out of respect for the process and the people involved.

For those curious about the ISTA boundaries work and guidelines: There are clear rules about participant-facilitator interactions, which sparked some interesting reflections on power dynamics in these spaces. While I don't necessarily agree with all the structures, I understand why they exist.
As someone who's explored various consciousness practices, from plant medicine to alternative philosophy, this training offers a unique perspective on personal development - though it's definitely not for everyone. If you're researching tantra workshop experiences, remember that your journey will be unique to you.

Like previous days, this is just my direct experience - neither a glowing endorsement nor a warning, just what actually happened. For context, check out Days 1 and 2 first.

#ISTA #TantraWorkshop #ConsciousnessWork #PersonalDevelopment

episodes.title: When Body Work Gets Real - ISTA #2
episodes.description:
Day two at ISTA and things got real fast. Started with my first Pod meeting (which I was lowkey nervous about), then straight into ecstatic dance where I had to let go of looking "normal." Thought I knew my boundaries until we did these exercises that changed everything. By evening, I found myself doing something I never thought I would - actually listening to what my body had to say. And you know what? It had a lot to say.

episodes.title: What Really Happens at an ISTA Workshop? - ISTA Day #1
episodes.description:
Before I went to ISTA, I searched everywhere trying to find out what actually happens at these trainings. But there's almost nothing online about the real experience, besides some particularly aggrieved and scary accounts on Reddit. So I decided to document my journey through this 7-day consciousness and boundaries workshop...Have I joined another cult? Everyone looks pretty happy on the website - So I went myself to find out what really goes on at ISTA. 

This video covers my first day at the International School of Temple Arts, from arrival to the opening ceremony. I'm sharing this because I know many people are curious about these trainings but might be hesitant to take the leap. Whether you're interested in conscious relating, personal development, tantra, shamanism or just wondering what ISTA is all about, I'll walk you through my experience...Which I probably should call out now, do get a little more intimate than I would normally be comfortable sharing with strangers. 

If you're new to Andy Joins Cults, I explore different consciousness and personal development workshops around the world. Make sure to subscribe to follow my entire ISTA journey...

✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦

episodes.title: Full Documentary: Star Magic Healing in Egypt
episodes.description:
I never expected my spiritual journey to Egypt would turn into... whatever this was. It started simple enough - joining this group called Star Magic to explore the ancient sites. But from the moment we stepped into the Great Pyramid, things got weird. Really weird.

The authorities weren't exactly thrilled with our "alternative" activities at the temples. And while everyone else seemed to be buying into the whole Emerald Tablets revelation thing, I kept wondering if we were actually onto something real about the pyramids' true purpose, or if we were just seeing what we wanted to see.

Then came that mushroom ceremony. Look, I still can't fully piece together what happened that night. All I know is it left me with more questions than answers. Was I getting closer to some hidden truth, or was I being pulled into something darker than I'd bargained for?

This isn't your typical tourist trip down the Nile. This is my story of trying to separate spiritual revelation from delusion in a land where the line between ancient wisdom and modern manipulation isn't always clear.

episodes.title: The Dark Encounter That Changed Everything - Star Magic Healing, Egypt #6
episodes.description:
I've been sitting with this for days now, trying to find the words. That mushroom ceremony... something happened. Something dark. The kind of experience that makes you question everything - reality, spirituality, even your own mind. I'm still not sure what was real and what wasn't, but one thing's clear: nothing about this trip is what it seemed.

episodes.title: They Stole My Camera - Star Magic Healing, Egypt #5
episodes.description:
Started peaceful enough - sunrise ceremony at the Temple of Isis. But like everything else on this trip, peace didn't last long. Jerry managed to get the police involved AGAIN, and things got pretty tense. Made a stop at Kom Ombo, got Jerry to open up a bit more about what's really going on, and then... well, let's just say the mushroom ceremony that followed took this whole experience to another level entirely. Still trying to process everything that happened.

New episode out now on:

episodes.title: Things Got Heated at Abu Simbel! - Star Magic Healing, Egypt #4
episodes.description:
Things got intense at Abu Simbel today. The moment Jerry started speaking in 'light language,' temple officials lost it. Then security shut down my meditation attempt - apparently sitting quietly is suspicious now? The whole thing's got me wondering what exactly they're so worried about. Ended the day with an "activation session" on the Nile, which... well, you'll have to hear about that for yourself.

episodes.title: They Think We Are What!? - Star Magic Healing, Egypt #3
What’s Going on at Edfu Temple!? - Star Magic Healing, Egypt #2
episodes.description:
Security was breathing down our necks at Edfu Temple today - not exactly the spiritual vibe I was looking for. Once we got back on the boat, I had to get some things off my chest about this whole Thoth and Emerald Tablets situation. Something's not adding up, and I'm starting to have some serious questions about what we're being told.
